name: BeriCautions
description: Moderation cautions that can auto-mute/timeout on thresholds and deduct Beri with clear audit reasons.
end_user_data_statement: Stores warning history, points, and timestamps for moderation purposes. No data is shared outside the server.
install_msg: Thanks for installing BeriCautions. Configure with `.cautionset` and issue warnings with `.caution`.
author: UltPanda
